TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供有关 ASP.NET 身份验证失败的信息。

span.span: Provides information about ASP.NET authentication failures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表介绍的功能为其默认情况下，asp.net 会引发事件。The following list describes the features for which events are raised by default by ASP.NET. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下配置 ASP.NET 以记录审核失败条件唯一，因为记录成功条件会严重损害系统资源。By default ASP.NET is configured to log audit failure conditions only, as logging success conditions can severely strain system resources. 你始终可以配置系统记录成功的情况。You can always configure the system to log the success conditions. - 窗体身份验证。Forms Authentication. 成功审核时包括用户名称进行身份验证;失败审核不包括用户名称，因为它们通常来自解密或验证失败的票证。While success audits include the user name that was authenticated; failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from a ticket that failed decryption or validation. 同时包含客户端的 IP 地址。Both contain the client IP address. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . - 成员身份。Membership. 成功和失败审核包含试图的用户名。Both success and failure audits contain the username that was attempted. 审核任何一种形式将包含已尝试的密码，因为，将保留在日志中有效的密码的危险。Neither form of audit will contain the password that was attempted, because that would risk persisting a valid password in the log. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . 当引发时，默认情况下它会更新审核身份验证失败事件引发的性能计数器。When a is raised, by default it updates the Audit Authentication Failure Events Raised performance counter. 若要查看在系统监视器 (PerfMon)，此性能计数器中**添加计数器**窗口中选择`ASP.NET`中**性能**对象下拉列表中，选择**身份验证失败事件引发**性能计数器，并单击**添加**按钮。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select `ASP.NET` in the **Performance** object drop-down list, select the **Authentication Failure Events Raised** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[与 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用系统监视器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) MSDN 上。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) on MSDN. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 进行调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 你可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义此构造函数。The following code example shows how to customize this constructor. span.span: Gets the name of the user to authenticate.
The name of the user to authenticate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅成功审核应包括已经过身份验证的用户的名称。Only the success audits should include the name of the authenticated user. 失败审核不应包括用户名称，因为它们通常来源于失败的解密或验证。The failure audits should not include the user name, since they typically result from failed decryption or validation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example shows how to use property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.vb#3)]
